originalText.text:
I have purchased several items now here inTampa. The quality is reasonable but the service is poor. I have never had such lackluster personal tailoring experiences. Their view seems to be the customer doesn’t know what he should want.
I will head back to New York for my personal clothing needs.

originalText.text: I've been purchasing a few articles of their clothes over the past several years but never managed to put a review here. This place is fantastic! It's hard to find a made-to-measure suit for someone with my body type but Thom Sweeney delivers. A big plus is the people who work here. Harry has been helping me all this time and he is fantastic at making sure their suits fit you perfectly. Hoping to get a bespoke suit from them someday!!

text.text: I've been purchasing a few articles of their clothes over the past several years but never managed to put a review here. This place is fantastic! It's hard to find a made-to-measure suit for someone with my body type but Thom Sweeney delivers. A big plus is the people who work here. Harry has been helping me all this time and he is fantastic at making sure their suits fit you perfectly. Hoping to get a bespoke suit from them someday!!

originalText.text:
You can tell from the moment you walk into Thom Sweeney that it’s not your regular up-market gentleman's clothing store. Though the displays and products are impeccable in both quality and design, there is a relaxed and almost cosy vibe that overcomes you as you browse these exceptional pieces.
Embraced by a lounge, a bar and a pool table, you may find yourself struggling to find a reason why you would leave a place that would rival the comforts of your own home.
Before you know it you've settled into a solid chin-wag with the likes of Harry and Pete to whose persona reminds you of an old school mate you may not have seen for years. The stark contrast between these gentleman and your everyday salesman is like chalk and cheese, an insult to them to even compare. Aside from being a couple of the most genuine and authentic people you may ever have the pleasure of meeting, their professional approach and style when it comes to assisting you with your requests is nothing short of astonishing. Their no pressure and honest attitude is a refreshing and very unfamiliar experience for the modern day patron.

To visit this store is an experience in itself and is a must.
Go for the clothing, stay for the atmosphere.
Clothing 10/10 Staff 11/10

originalText.text: What an amazing experience at Thom Sweeney. The crew that works there really knows their stuff and the selection is exceptional.
